original_text: None of the sins that person has committed will be remembered against them. They have done what is just and right; they will surely live.
korean_text: 그가 본래 범한 모든 죄가 기억되지 아니하리니 그가 반드시 살리라 이는 정의와 공의를 행하였음이라 하라

sentences.original_text: None of the sins that person has committed
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람이 저지른 죄들 중 아무것도

sentences.original_text: They have done what is just and right
